block.p: Glenn Gallega Galang and John Glennon Marples affirmed their partnership last evening in a commitment ceremony led by Courtney Prentis, a Presbyterian deacon, at Terra, a gallery in San Francisco.

Mr. Galang (above, left), 36, works in Columbus, Ohio, as a software consultant at CedarCrestone, a firm affiliated with Oracle. He graduated from California Polytechnic State University in San Luis Obispo.
Glenn Gallega Galang and John Glennon Marples affirmed their partnership Saturday evening in a commitment ceremony led by Courtney Prentis at Terra, a gallery in San Francisco.
Glenn Gallega Galang and John Glennon Marples affirmed their partnership last evening in a commitment ceremony led by Courtney Prentis, a Presbyterian deacon, at Terra, a gallery in San Francisco.

Mr. Galang (above, left), 36, works in Columbus, Ohio, as a software consultant at CedarCrestone, a firm affiliated with Oracle. He graduated from California Polytechnic State University in San Luis Obispo.
He is the son of Rosita and Ernesto Galang of South San Francisco.
Mr. Marples, 29, teaches first grade at Don Callejon School in Santa Clara, Calif. He graduated from Haverford College and received a master's in curriculum and teacher education from Stanford.
He is a son of Sally and Lynn Marples of Duxbury, Mass.
